post_title: Here's my first cs2 skin. It's a bit old style metallic and shiny. What do you think?
comments: Looks like it was dropped in mud. Not a fan personally.

post_title: Proud to show you guys my new USP skin: the Flanker! Lots of variants including a rally Group B inspired one, hope you guys enjoy it! Link in the comments!
comments: Wow, each and everyone are cool af
They kinda look like skins which already exist
Thats some quality skin :D Could Imagine the Group B one as a purple/pink, love the detail
Thank you! The Group B one is my personal favorite, so seeing it ingame would be incredible :D
